name: Silvermane Cannoneer
description:
A cannoneer of the Silvermane Guards who wields a portable hand cannon into battle.
During combat, Silvermane Cannoneers will launch brutal chain attacks with their allies.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Covering Support
skills.description: Provides support to a friendly unit. When this unit attacks, it performs a Follow-up ATK that deals minor Physical DMG to the attacked target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Covering Support
skills.description: Provides support to a friendly unit. When this unit attacks, it performs a Follow-up ATK that deals minor Physical DMG to the attacked target and units adjacent to the target.
